name: df-ig1p
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cig1p, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cfv(clidl, cfv(cpl1, cv(s0))), cif(cfv(c0g, cfv(cpl1, cv(s0))), crio(s2, cin(cv(s1), cfv(cmn1, cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(cfv(cdg1, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), cinf(cima(cfv(cdg1, cv(s0)), cdif(cv(s1), csn(cfv(c0g, cfv(cpl1, cv(s0)))))), cr, clt))), wceq(cv(s1), csn(cfv(c0g, cfv(cpl1, cv(s0)))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ idlGen1p =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà(LIdeal `(Poly1 ` s0))‚Ü¶ if(s1 = {(0 `(Poly1 ` s0))},(0 `(Poly1 ` s0)), iota(s2 ‚àà(s1 ‚ãÇ(Monic1p ` s0)),((deg1 ` s0)` s2)= inf(((deg1 ` s0)"(s1 \ {(0 `(Poly1 ` s0))})), ‚Ñù, <)))))
comment: Define a choice function for generators of ideals over a division ring; this is the unique monic polynomial of minimal degree in the ideal. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Mar-2015.) (Revised by AV, 25-Sep-2020.)
